::KitKat::

She recieved the transmission. "Diamond, show our new guess to the 
seconsary conference room. I shall be there shortly."
She sighed, Drillbit would have to wait a little longer than 
originally thought.

Diamond::
She walked up and saw DarkMouse with a strange bot. Then she saw 
blacknightmare. "I am Diamond. Follow me and I'll take you to KitKat."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:

>
